title: Babka
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons dried active baking yeast', '125ml (4 fl oz) warm water (45 C)', '475ml (16 fl oz) milk', '225g (8 oz) butter, softened', '5 eggs', '4 egg yolks', '200g (7 oz) caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '1 tablespoon Grand Marnier (optional)', '3 tablespoons orange zest', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1.25kg (2½ lb) plain flour, or more as needed', '225g (8 oz) dried currants', '450g (1 lb) sultanas', '150g (5 oz) flaked almonds, chopped', 'Crumb topping', '50g (2 oz) butter', '100g (4 oz) dark brown soft sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '125g (4¼oz) plain flour']
